citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC had a meeting, conducted a facility inspection and program review October 2020. The previous meeting,
facility inspection and program review was conducted December 2019, approximately 10 months apart. An Institutional
Official (IO) Report was not generated from either meeting. IO Reports summarize program review and facility inspection
findings so optimal animal welfare can be provided. IO reports shall be generated and updated at least once every six
months upon completion of the required semiannual evaluations.
Correct by: April 30, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c)(3)  Repeat
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC had a meeting, conducted a facility inspection and program review October 2020.  The previous meeting, 
facility inspection and program review was conducted December 2019, approximately 10 months apart.  An Institutional 
Official (IO) Report was not generated from either meeting.  IO Reports summarize program review and facility inspection 
findings so optimal animal welfare can be provided.  IO reports shall be generated and updated at least once every six 
months upon completion of the required semiannual evaluations. 
 
Correct by:  April 30, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives. 
 
End Section
